articles.title: 8 things that make us moody and how to avoid it - The Times of India
articles.description: Understanding what triggers moodiness is the first step in managing it effectively. By making conscious lifestyle choices we can significantly improve our mood and overall well-being. Small changes can lead to big improvements in how you feel each day.

articles.title: Neanderthals cared for 6-year-old with Down syndrome, fossil find reveals - Livescience.com
articles.description: The unique shape of an ear bone belonging to a Neanderthal child found in a cave in Spain suggests that she had Down syndrome.
articles.content:
A 6-year-old Neanderthal child had Down syndrome
, a new analysis of an oddly shaped ear bone found in a cave in Spain suggests.
The finding is the first known case of Down syndrome in Neanderthals… [+3338 chars]
